items.sentence: By the time I arrived, everybody had already gone.
Tom invited all his friends to his birthday party.
Tom isn't cruel to animals, but Mary thinks he is.
Tom needs to stay here with us for the time being.
Tom tried to stay awake until his father got home.
Tom isn't a very good cook, but at least he tries.
I'm not really interested in doing that right now.
I pulled over on the side of the road and got out.
What kind of things do you do for fun around here?
I had intended to go with Tom, but I was too busy.
